name: Maze Race Challenge
description:
Enjoy the thrill of racing other players through a 3d maze on your iPhone or iPad.

Use the on-screen joystick controller to move forward, backward, turn left or right.

Find the exit as quickly as possible.

Can peek at map up to 5 times to make sure you’re going the right way.

Instant replay displays a top-down view showing how efficiently you made it through the maze.

Three difficulty levels to challenge all ages. Mazes are randomly generated, so it’s a different maze each time you play.

Enjoy by yourself or go head-to-head online against invited opponent(s).

Game is multiplayer and multi-platform, supporting most popular smartphones, tablets, and computers.

Optionally shares your accomplishments with Facebook, Twitter, email, or instant messaging.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone X displays.
